plot: After active tours of duty on the front lines, Nate Fick embraces a larger vision of what the US Marines represent in the midst of the war in Iraq and Afghanistan, and preserving integrity in the face of patriotism.
title: One Bullet Away
plot_es: After active tours of duty on the front lines, Nate Fick embraces a larger vision of what the US Marines represent in the midst of the war in Iraq and Afghanistan, and preserving integrity in the face of patriotism.
plot_en: After active tours of duty on the front lines, Nate Fick embraces a larger vision of what the US Marines represent in the midst of the war in Iraq and Afghanistan, and preserving integrity in the face of patriotism.
